languages.text: {n}Рев Паскаля похож на аварийный гудок экстрактора.{/n} "Генерал-Фабрикатор?! Фиксирую кощунство!"
{n}Pasqal's roar is like the blaring alarm of an extractor.{/n} "Fabricator General? I am registering heresy!"
languages.original_text: {n}Рев Паскаля похож на аварийный гудок экстрактора.{/n} "Генерал-Фабрикатор?! Фиксирую кощунство!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal's roar is like the blaring alarm of an extractor.{/n} "Fabricator-General? I am registering blasphemy!"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal's roar is like the blaring alarm of an extractor.{/n} "Fabricator General? I am registering heresy!"

languages.text: {n}パスカルの咆哮は警報を鳴り響かせる抽出器のようだった。{/n}「製造総司令だと？異端を記録する！」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's roar is like the blaring alarm of an extractor.{/n} "Fabricator General? I am registering heresy!"

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルの咆哮は警報を鳴り響かせる抽出器のようだった。{/n}「製造総司令だと？異端を記録する！」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡咆哮起来，声音就像开采器发出的刺耳警报声。{/n}“你说你是铸造将军？检测到异端言论！”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's roar is like the blaring alarm of an extractor.{/n} "Fabricator General? I am registering heresy!"

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡咆哮起来，声音就像开采器发出的刺耳警报声。{/n}“你说你是铸造将军？正在记录异端言论！”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Fabricator général ? {n}s'écrie Pasqal d'une voix proche du signal d'alarme d'un extracteur.{/n} Hérésie détectée ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's roar is like the blaring alarm of an extractor.{/n} "Fabricator General? I am registering heresy!"

traits.locale_text: « Fabricator général ? {n}s'écrie Pasqal d'une voix proche du signal d'alarme d'un extracteur.{/n} Hérésie détectée ! »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}El grito de Pasqal suena como la estridente alarma de un extractor.{/n} «¿Fabricator General? ¡Herejía detectada!».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's roar is like the blaring alarm of an extractor.{/n} "Fabricator General? I am registering heresy!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El grito de Pasqal suena como la estridente alarma de un extractor.{/n} «¿Fabricator General? ¡Herejía detectada!».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqals Brüllen gleicht dem dröhnenden Alarm eines Extraktors.{/n} "Manufactor Principalis? Ich registriere Ketzerei!"
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's roar is like the blaring alarm of an extractor.{/n} "Fabricator General? I am registering heresy!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqals Brüllen gleicht dem dröhnenden Alarm eines Extraktors.{/n} "Manufactor Principalis? Ich registriere Ketzerei!"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal, bir ayıklayıcının tiz alarmı gibi kükrüyor.{/n} "Tümfabrikatör mü? Kâfirlik kaydediyorum!"
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's roar is like the blaring alarm of an extractor.{/n} "Fabricator General? I am registering heresy!"
